workExperience.detailedDescription: I spearheaded transformative projects aimed at optimizing workflows and enhancing performance. Notably, I designed and developed an Azure function to automate Starbucks Partnerâ€™s Workplace profile updates via Service Bus integration, reducing manual intervention and optimizing operational workflows. I also developed a cutting-edge web application that streamlined ticket resolution, reducing analysis time by 80%. Additionally, I ensured seamless operation of critical applications across Starbucks locations in North America and implemented performance optimizations that reduced failures and boosted overall performance. My collaborative efforts with cross-functional teams drove technological advancements, consistently delivering value to Starbucks and its customers.

Developed a web application for tracking task progress in Agile projects, enabling task creation, progress updates, and tracking through dashboards using ReactJS and Redux. Engineered a robust Java Spring Boot application to handle API management and secure data storage, guaranteeing data integrity and reliable functionality. Architected and implemented a highly optimized MySQL database schema, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for enhanced application performance.
